aboutMe.para: My name is Yonela Mangele and I am currently 20 years old. I am an aspiring fullstack web developer and it is all because of my unwavering dedication and love for coding. Ever since I started coding in high school, I have always challenged myself with requiring more assignments from my lecturer so that I could hone my coding skills and also learn how to handle multiple tasks at once on a daily basis, which is a skillset I am currently mastering. When I have a group project, I enjoy leading the group because I have a creative approach to solving a problem. My sense of humour also helps to lighten the mood of my group members and when they are in a fun space to work in, they become motivated to meet the deadlines of projects we work on because as much as I tease around to create a healthy environment, I take my work seriously.

projects.name: calculator
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a functional calculator.

projects.name: bmi-calculator
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a functional BMI-Calculator.

projects.name: keyboard
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a non-functional keyboard.

projects.name: temperature-converter
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a functional temperature-converter.

projects.name: Website
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a basic website that consists of the things I like.

education.description: I am currently doing a 12-month coding course at Life Choices Coding Academy and I am learning multiple programming languages such as HTML, CSS, BOOTSTRAP, etc.
I did coding from Gr10 until Gr12 at COSAT, which is a secondary school in Khayelitsha, Cape Town. I only learned mostly HTML because it was the only programming language that was provided.

testimonials.name: Taahir Du Toit
testimonials.message: They say you should surround yourself with qualities of success and i believe Yonela has all of them. He is always radiating positivity. He is hard-working and works great with others. He questions where he is unsure but makes sure his due diligence before hand.

testimonials.name: Sihlandlo Makhumsha
testimonials.message: Yonela, a humble brother, very committed in meeting deadlines. Doesn't talk too much, you just give him a PC and see MAGIC happening just right before your eyes.

testimonials.name: Kiara Adams
testimonials.message: Yonela is the epitome of hard work; his dedication and perseverance are truly inspiring. He has a welcoming demeanor and genuine interest in others that create a warm atmosphere around him, luring people in. Despite his quiet demeanor, Yonela's presence speaks volumes in our class. His thoughtful insights and peaceful presence enrich our discussions and create a calm learning environment.

testimonials.name: Ntando Mabuto
testimonials.message: Yonela is a very commited person and his commitment leads to great success. He is also approachable and a good teamplayer.

testimonials.name: Marcus Adonis
testimonials.message: Quiet and humble person but enjoys the company of people. Works hard and as a lot of good ideas that are flexible that works well within a team.

testimonials.name: Siphokuhle Nyana
testimonials.message: Yonela has a unique ability to approach complex problems with a clear and level head, always finding creative solutions that benefit the project and the team. Their communication skills are outstanding,one of Yonela Mangeleâ€™s greatest strengths is their ability to work well under pressure. They remain calm and focused, even in the most challenging situations, and their positivity is contagious.I have learned so much from him and appreciate the support and guidance they have provided me during our time working together. I highly recommend Yonela to anyone looking for a talented and dedicated professional.
